title: Add innovation images beside each innovation card

requirements.text: Update the Innovations page (frontend/src/pages/InnovationsPage.tsx) so each innovation card displays an image beside the innovation content (title/description), using the user-uploaded files mapped as follows: Artifyer: The Canvas Experience -> "Artifyer The Canvas Experience.png"; Oil Spill Catcher (OSC) -> "OSC.png"; The GPR -> "The GPR.jpg".

quotes: In the our innovations page add these photos to beside of each innovation. For The GPR use The GPR.jpg, for oil spill catcher use the OSC.png and for the Artifyer: The Canvas Experience use the Artifyer The Canvas Experience.png

acceptanceCriteria: Each of the three innovation cards on the Innovations page shows the correct corresponding image next to the innovation text.
The layout is responsive: on smaller screens the image and text stack cleanly without overflow, and on larger screens the image appears beside the text.
Each image includes appropriate alt text matching the innovation title.

requirements.text: Add the uploaded image files to the frontend static assets so they can be referenced by the Innovations page at runtime without using the backend (place them in a public assets directory and reference via an absolute /assets/... path consistent with existing usage on the page).

quotes: The user has uploaded 3 image(s): Artifyer The Canvas Experience.png, The GPR.jpg, OSC.png.

acceptanceCriteria: The three uploaded image files are present in the frontend static assets and load successfully in the browser (no broken images).
The Innovations page references the images via /assets/... paths (consistent with existing slider images).

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only components); compose them as-is.
Do not add new backend canisters or services; keep changes frontend-only.
nonGoals: Do not change the written descriptions/titles of the innovations (only add images and layout).
Do not add new innovations or new pages.
